title: random-generators
content: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <title>John Henry</title> <link rel="canonical" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/" /> <meta name="description" content="John Henry's Person Portfolio and Blog" /> <meta name="robots" content="index,follow" /> <meta name="theme-color" content="#343233" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" /> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta name="keywords" content="fun,math,engineering,science,experiments,programming" /> <meta name="author" content="John Henry" /> <link rel="icon" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/image/iajh.png" type="image/png" /> </head> <body><h1 id="random-generators">Random Generators</h1> <p>These are methods of generating a sample, <em>x</em>, for a given random variable, <em>X</em>.</p> <p><strong>No guarantees are made as to the distribution of the random variable.</strong></p> <h2 id="float">Float</h2> <h3 id="x-0-1">X := [ 0, 1 )</h3> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode javascript"><code class="sourceCode javascript">() <span class="op">=&gt;</span> <span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">random</span>()<span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">// R</span></code></pre></div> <h3 id="x-0-1-1">X := ( 0, 1 ]</h3> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode javascript"><code class="sourceCode javascript">() <span class="op">=&gt;</span> <span class="op">-</span>(<span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">random</span>() <span class="op">-</span> <span class="dv">1</span>)<span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">// -(R-1)</span></code></pre></div> <h3 id="x-0-n">X := [ 0, N )</h3> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode javascript"><code class="sourceCode javascript">(N) <span class="op">=&gt;</span> <span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">random</span>() <span class="op">*</span> N<span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">// R*N</span></code></pre></div> <h3 id="x-m-n">X := [ M, N )</h3> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode javascript"><code class="sourceCode javascript">(M<span class="op">,</span> N) <span class="op">=&gt;</span> <span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">random</span>() <span class="op">*</span> (N <span class="op">-</span> M) <span class="op">+</span> M<span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">// R*(N-M)+M</span></code></pre></div> <h3 id="x-1-infinity">X := [ 1, Infinity )</h3> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode javascript"><code class="sourceCode javascript">() <span class="op">=&gt;</span> <span class="dv">-1</span> / (<span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">random</span>() <span class="op">-</span> <span class="dv">1</span>)<span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">// -1/(R-1)</span></code></pre></div> <h3 id="x-1-infinity-1">X := ( 1, Infinity ]</h3> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode javascript"><code class="sourceCode javascript">() <span class="op">=&gt;</span> <span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">random</span>() <span class="op">**</span> (<span class="op">-</span><span class="dv">1</span> / <span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">random</span>())<span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">// R^(-1/R)</span></code></pre></div> <h2 id="integer">Integer</h2> <h3 id="x-1-n">X := [ 1, N ]</h3> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode javascript"><code class="sourceCode javascript">(N) <span class="op">=&gt;</span> <span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">ceil</span>(<span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">random</span>() <span class="op">*</span> N)<span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">// R*N</span></code></pre></div> <h3 id="x-0-n-1">X := [ 0, N ]</h3> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode javascript"><code class="sourceCode javascript">(N) <span class="op">=&gt;</span> <span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">floor</span>(<span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">random</span>() <span class="op">*</span> N <span class="op">+</span> <span class="dv">1</span>)<span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">// R*N+1</span></code></pre></div> <h3 id="x-m-n-1">X := [ M, N ]</h3> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode javascript"><code class="sourceCode javascript">(M<span class="op">,</span> N) <span class="op">=&gt;</span> <span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">floor</span>(<span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">random</span>() <span class="op">*</span> (N <span class="op">-</span> M <span class="op">+</span> <span class="dv">1</span>) <span class="op">+</span> M)<span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">// R*(N-M)+N</span></code></pre></div> <h2 id="boolean">Boolean</h2> <h3 id="x-true-false">X := { true, false }</h3> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode javascript"><code class="sourceCode javascript">() <span class="op">=&gt;</span> <span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">random</span>() <span class="op">&lt;</span> <span class="fl">0.5</span><span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">// R&lt;0.5</span></code></pre></div> <h2 id="multiset-array">Multiset (Array)</h2> <h3 id="x-array-any">X := []:Array&lt; any &gt;</h3> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode javascript"><code class="sourceCode javascript">(...<span class="at">A</span>) <span class="op">=&gt;</span> A[<span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">floor</span>(<span class="va">Math</span>.<span class="at">random</span>() <span class="op">*</span> <span class="va">A</span>.<span class="at">length</span>)]<span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">// A[R*|A|]</span></code></pre></div> <h2 id="bytes">Bytes</h2> <h3 id="x-typedarray-number-n">X := TypedArray&lt; number &gt;(N)</h3> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode javascript"><code class="sourceCode javascript">(N) <span class="op">=&gt;</span> <span class="va">globalThis</span>.<span class="va">crypto</span>.<span class="at">getRandomValues</span>(<span class="kw">new</span> <span class="at">Uint8ClampedArray</span>(N))<span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">// g(N)</span></code></pre></div> </body> </html>

title: broadcast-channel-worker
content: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <title>John Henry</title> <link rel="canonical" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/" /> <meta name="description" content="John Henry's Person Portfolio and Blog" /> <meta name="robots" content="index,follow" /> <meta name="theme-color" content="#343233" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" /> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta name="keywords" content="fun,math,engineering,science,experiments,programming" /> <meta name="author" content="John Henry" /> <link rel="icon" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/image/iajh.png" type="image/png" /> </head> <body><h1 id="broadcast-channel-worker">Broadcast Channel Worker</h1> <p>Communicate across windows</p> </body> </html>

title: define-component.component
content: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <title>John Henry</title> <link rel="canonical" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/" /> <meta name="description" content="John Henry's Person Portfolio and Blog" /> <meta name="robots" content="index,follow" /> <meta name="theme-color" content="#343233" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" /> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta name="keywords" content="fun,math,engineering,science,experiments,programming" /> <meta name="author" content="John Henry" /> <link rel="icon" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/image/iajh.png" type="image/png" /> </head> <body><h1 id="define-component">Define Component</h1> <p>HTML Component to define HTML components.</p> <h2 id="usage">Usage</h2> <h3 id="maunal">Maunal</h3> <p>Define class to be removed</p> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode js"><code class="sourceCode javascript"><span class="co">// file:///./custom-component.mjs</span> <span class="im">export</span> <span class="im">default</span> <span class="kw">class</span> <span class="kw">extends</span> HTMLElement <span class="op">{</span> <span class="co">///...</span> <span class="op">}</span></code></pre></div> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode html"><code class="sourceCode html"><span class="kw">&lt;script&gt;</span> <span class="im">import</span> defineComponent <span class="im">from</span> <span class="st">&quot;https://johnhenry.github.io/lib/define-component.component/0.0.0/index.mjs&quot;</span><span class="op">;</span> <span class="va">globalThis</span>.<span class="va">customElements</span>.<span class="at">define</span>(<span class="st">&quot;define-component&quot;</span><span class="op">,</span> defineComponent)<span class="op">;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;/script&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;define-component</span> <span class="ot"> name=</span><span class="st">&quot;custom-component&quot;</span> <span class="ot"> src=</span><span class="st">&quot;./custom-component.mjs&quot;</span> <span class="kw">&gt;&lt;/define-component&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;custom-component&gt;&lt;/custom-component&gt;</span></code></pre></div> <h3 id="automatic">Automatic</h3> <p>Use &quot;global&quot; import to automatically use component name &quot;define-component&quot;</p> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode html"><code class="sourceCode html"><span class="kw">&lt;script</span> <span class="ot"> type=</span><span class="st">&quot;module&quot;</span> <span class="ot"> src=</span><span class="st">&quot;https://johnhenry.github.io/lib/define-component.component/0.0.0/global.mjs&quot;</span> <span class="kw">&gt;&lt;/script&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;define-component</span> <span class="ot"> name=</span><span class="st">&quot;custom-component&quot;</span> <span class="ot"> src=</span><span class="st">&quot;./custom-component.mjs&quot;</span> <span class="kw">&gt;&lt;/define-component&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;custom-component</span><span class="ot"> class=</span><span class="st">&quot;loading&quot;</span><span class="kw">&gt;</span>Hide me until window load<span class="kw">&lt;/custom-component&gt;</span></code></pre></div> </body> </html>

title: cbor
content: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <title>John Henry</title> <link rel="canonical" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/" /> <meta name="description" content="John Henry's Person Portfolio and Blog" /> <meta name="robots" content="index,follow" /> <meta name="theme-color" content="#343233" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" /> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta name="keywords" content="fun,math,engineering,science,experiments,programming" /> <meta name="author" content="John Henry" /> <link rel="icon" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/image/iajh.png" type="image/png" /> </head> <body><h1 id="concise-binary-object-representation-cbor">Concise Binary Object Representation (CBOR)</h1> <p>Based on the specification <a href="https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc8949">here</a></p> <p>(<a href="https://www.ietf.org/id/draft-ietf-cbor-7049bis-14.txt">old</a>)</p> <h2 id="api">API</h2> <h3 id="encode-function">encode function</h3> <h3 id="decode-function">decode function</h3> <h3 id="tag-class">Tag class</h3> <h2 id="types">Types</h2> <h3 id="booleans-null-undefined">Booleans, null, undefined</h3> <h3 id="numbers">Numbers</h3> <h3 id="strings">Strings</h3> <p>// NOTE: emoji don't work -- represented by more than one byte // const input =&quot;&quot;;</p> <h3 id="bytes">Bytes</h3> <h3 id="integers">Integers</h3> <h3 id="arrays">Arrays</h3> <h3 id="objectsmaps">Objects/Maps</h3> <h3 id="tags">Tags</h3> <h2 id="testing">Testing</h2> <p>deno run --allow-read test.mjs</p> </body> </html>

title: DOM-nodes-to-text
content: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <title>John Henry</title> <link rel="canonical" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/" /> <meta name="description" content="John Henry's Person Portfolio and Blog" /> <meta name="robots" content="index,follow" /> <meta name="theme-color" content="#343233" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" /> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta name="keywords" content="fun,math,engineering,science,experiments,programming" /> <meta name="author" content="John Henry" /> <link rel="icon" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/image/iajh.png" type="image/png" /> </head> <body><h1 id="dom-nodes-to-text">Dom Nodes to text</h1> <p>Transform dom nodes into text.</p> <p>This is extremely useful when logging DOM nodes as they are often logged &quot;live&quot; meaning that when you look at the console, you will see the latest state; not the state at the time of logging.</p> <h2 id="usage">Usage</h2> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode html"><code class="sourceCode html"><span class="kw">&lt;ul</span><span class="ot"> id=</span><span class="st">&quot;list&quot;</span><span class="kw">&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;li&gt;</span>one<span class="kw">&lt;/li&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;li&gt;</span>two<span class="kw">&lt;/li&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;li&gt;</span>three<span class="kw">&lt;/li&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;/ul&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;script</span><span class="ot"> type=</span><span class="st">&quot;module&quot;</span><span class="kw">&gt;</span> <span class="im">import</span> domNodesToText <span class="im">from</span> <span class="st">&quot;..&quot;</span><span class="op">;</span> <span class="va">console</span>.<span class="at">log</span>(<span class="at">domNodesToText</span>(<span class="va">document</span>.<span class="at">querySelector</span>(<span class="st">&quot;#list&quot;</span>)))<span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">/* logs</span> <span class="co"> &lt;ul id=&quot;li&quot;&gt;</span> <span class="co"> &lt;li&gt;one&lt;/li&gt;</span> <span class="co"> &lt;li&gt;two&lt;/li&gt;</span> <span class="co"> &lt;li&gt;three&lt;/li&gt;</span> <span class="co"> &lt;/ul&gt;</span> <span class="co"> */</span> <span class="kw">&lt;/script&gt;</span></code></pre></div> <h3 id="multiple-nodes">Multiple Nodes</h3> <p>Use the spread operatore to turn lists of nodes into text</p> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode javascript"><code class="sourceCode javascript"><span class="va">console</span>.<span class="at">log</span>(<span class="at">domNodesToText</span>(...<span class="va">document</span>.<span class="at">querySelectorAll</span>(<span class="st">&quot;li&quot;</span>)))<span class="op">;</span> <span class="co">/* logs</span> <span class="co"> &lt;li&gt;one&lt;/li&gt;</span> <span class="co"> &lt;li&gt;two&lt;/li&gt;</span> <span class="co"> &lt;li&gt;three&lt;/li&gt;</span> <span class="co"> */</span></code></pre></div> </body> </html>

title: until-window-load
content: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <title>John Henry</title> <link rel="canonical" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/" /> <meta name="description" content="John Henry's Person Portfolio and Blog" /> <meta name="robots" content="index,follow" /> <meta name="theme-color" content="#343233" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" /> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta name="keywords" content="fun,math,engineering,science,experiments,programming" /> <meta name="author" content="John Henry" /> <link rel="icon" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/image/iajh.png" type="image/png" /> </head> <body><h1 id="until-window-load">Until Window Load</h1> <p>Declarative import to remove loading classes once the window has loaded.</p> <p>Useful for to avoid content flash for custom components that arrange content after loading.</p> <h2 id="usage">Usage</h2> <h3 id="maunal">Maunal</h3> <p>Define class to be removed</p> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode js"><code class="sourceCode javascript"><span class="im">import</span> removeLoadingClasses <span class="im">from</span> <span class="st">&quot;https://johnhenry.github.io/lib/remove-loading-classes/0.0.0/index.mjs&quot;</span><span class="op">;</span> <span class="at">removeLoadingClasses</span>(<span class="st">&quot;custom-loading-class&quot;</span>)<span class="op">;</span></code></pre></div> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode css"><code class="sourceCode css"><span class="fu">.custom-loading-class</span> { <span class="kw">visibility</span>: <span class="dv">hidden</span>; }</code></pre></div> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode html"><code class="sourceCode html"><span class="kw">&lt;custom-component</span><span class="ot"> class=</span><span class="st">&quot;custom-loading-class&quot;</span> <span class="kw">&gt;</span>Hide me until window load<span class="kw">&lt;/custom-component</span> <span class="kw">&gt;</span></code></pre></div> <h3 id="automatic">Automatic</h3> <p>Use &quot;global&quot; import to automatically use class name &quot;until-window-load&quot;</p> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode html"><code class="sourceCode html"><span class="kw">&lt;script</span> <span class="ot"> type=</span><span class="st">&quot;module&quot;</span> <span class="ot"> src=</span><span class="st">&quot;https://johnhenry.github.io/lib/remove-loading-classes/0.0.0/global.mjs&quot;</span> <span class="kw">&gt;&lt;/script&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;style&gt;</span> <span class="fu">.until-window-load</span> { <span class="kw">visibility</span>: <span class="dv">hidden</span>; } <span class="kw">&lt;/style&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;custom-component</span><span class="ot"> class=</span><span class="st">&quot;until-window-load&quot;</span> <span class="kw">&gt;</span>Hide me until window load<span class="kw">&lt;/custom-component</span> <span class="kw">&gt;</span></code></pre></div> </body> </html>

title: query-container.component
content: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <title>John Henry</title> <link rel="canonical" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/" /> <meta name="description" content="John Henry's Person Portfolio and Blog" /> <meta name="robots" content="index,follow" /> <meta name="theme-color" content="#343233" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" /> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta name="keywords" content="fun,math,engineering,science,experiments,programming" /> <meta name="author" content="John Henry" /> <link rel="icon" href="https://johnhenry.github.io/image/iajh.png" type="image/png" /> </head> <body><h1 id="query-container-html-component">Query Container HTML Component</h1> <p>Containter that changes based on a given media query</p> <p>Inspired by: https://github.com/tabvengers/spicy-sections</p> <h2 id="example-usage-usage">Example usage Usage</h2> <p>Single query:</p> <p>This following will produce an ordered list with class name 'ordered' and blue text when the window's width is between 400px and 900px.</p> <div class="sourceCode"><pre class="sourceCode html"><code class="sourceCode html"><span class="kw">&lt;script</span> <span class="ot"> type=</span><span class="st">&quot;module&quot;</span> <span class="ot"> src=</span><span class="st">&quot;https://johnhenry.github.io/lib/js/define-component.component/0.0.0/global.mjs&quot;</span> <span class="kw">&gt;&lt;/script&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;define-component</span><span class="ot"> name=</span><span class="st">&quot;query-component&quot;</span><span class="ot"> src=</span><span class="st">&quot;./index.mjs&quot;</span><span class="kw">&gt;&lt;/define-component&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;query-component</span> <span class="ot"> default=</span><span class="st">&quot;ul&quot;</span> <span class="ot"> query=</span><span class="st">&quot;</span> <span class="st"> [(min-width:300px) and (max-width:1200px)] ol.ordered[style=color:blue];</span> <span class="st"> [(min-width:400px) and (max-width:600px)] ol.ordered[style=color:red];</span> <span class="st"> &quot;</span> <span class="kw">&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;li&gt;</span>a<span class="kw">&lt;/li&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;li&gt;</span>b<span class="kw">&lt;/li&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;li&gt;</span>c<span class="kw">&lt;/li&gt;</span> <span class="kw">&lt;/query-component&gt;</span></code></pre></div> </body> </html>
